snippet.title: PSX Longplay [068] Ridge Racer Type 4
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Deskawa

This is the last Ridge Racer for the PSX and is sometimes considered the best one in the series, specially for its aesthetical merits.

This will be a simple walkthrough of the story mode. This time I didn't find an excuse to record the mirror mode and show you the rest of the game's music, but instead I recorded a second video with the missing stories. First Team Mappy, Pac Racing club at 12:14 and Dig Racing Team at 25:52.

Note from publisher staff: Visit http://www.longplays.org to download bonus video. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
